text: læa xallxhˌ thrng kahnd khukhrxng kæ phwk cea sung ma cak hmu phwk cea læa thrng thahı phwk cea mi luk læa hlan cak khukhrxng khxng phwk cea læa thrng prathan ri ski cak sing di «kæ phwk cea dangnan tx sing thec phwk khea sraththa læa tx khwam pordpran khx ngxallxhˌ phwk khea nerkhun kranan hrux
